Title: Las Vegas

Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: A flashback to Ray and Abby's 21st anniversary when they went to Las Vegas to see Damon's first televised fight. In the present, movie star Natalie James hires Ray to protect her from an ...
